Sentencas: The maritime industry has entered its pathway of decarbonization.
Titulo: Feasibility assessment of a container ship applying ammonia cracker-integrated solid oxide fuel cell technology

Sentencas: To achieve the IMO's ambitious goals of an absolute emissions reduction of 50% by 2050, and a 70% carbon intensity reduction by 2050 compared to the 2008 level, various options for the adoption of technologies and alternative fuels are considered by the market stakeholders.
Titulo: Feasibility assessment of a container ship applying ammonia cracker-integrated solid oxide fuel cell technology

Sentencas: Ammonia, one of the most promising alternative marine fuels has long been considered to reduce carbon emissions.
Titulo: Feasibility assessment of a container ship applying ammonia cracker-integrated solid oxide fuel cell technology

Sentencas: And solid oxide fuel cell is expected to transform ship propulsion technology in the future due to its high utilization of fuels.
Titulo: Feasibility assessment of a container ship applying ammonia cracker-integrated solid oxide fuel cell technology

Sentencas: In this paper, a feasibility study is performed to assess the application of an ammonia cracker-integrated solid oxide fuel cell (hereafter as Ammonia SOFC) system on an ocean-going vessel through a detailed CAPEX, FuelEX, OPEX, Carbon tax, and carbon emission analysis.
Titulo: Feasibility assessment of a container ship applying ammonia cracker-integrated solid oxide fuel cell technology

Sentencas: Comparison is made with direct ammonia, LNG and conventional fuels fired heat engines.
Titulo: Feasibility assessment of a container ship applying ammonia cracker-integrated solid oxide fuel cell technology

Sentencas: The result concludes that it can be economically viable to apply to deep-sea shipping, compared to other marine fuels and propulsion technologies.(c) 2022 Hydrogen Energy Publications LLC.
Titulo: Feasibility assessment of a container ship applying ammonia cracker-integrated solid oxide fuel cell technology
